original_title: Come On Up to the House
overview: At the end of the summer in 2018, Glen Hansard and The Footsbarn Travelling Theatre traveled around Ireland, pitching a beautiful circus tent in four remote locations. They used the space for music, theatre, poetry, and there was even room made for fun, joy and laughter.  Filmmaker Myles Oâ€™Reilly documented the madness.
title: Come On Up to the House
